turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order pizzas from Bella Luna's Pizzeria. Can you help me out, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get two pizzas, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what are the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get one macaroni cheese pizza and one Hawaiian pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of crust do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can you add extra cheese to both of those pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 2 medium thick crust pizzas: one with macaroni and cheese and a hawaiian, extra cheese on both, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your total is $38.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you. That would be for pick up, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for that and your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it! enjoy your pizzas.
